headlines.description: Fourth-placed West Ham United were held to a 0-0 draw at lowly Burnley in the Premier League on Sunday with home keeper Nick Pope earning his side a
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham held at struggling Burnley

headlines.description: Belgium midfielder Youri Tielemans scored twice as Leicester City thrashed Newcastle United 4-0 in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tielemans hits two as Leicester crush  Newcastle

headlines.description: Conor Gallagher scored twice and James Tomkins was also on target as Crystal Palace arrested a run of three defeats by beating Everton 3-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pressure mounts on Benitez as Everton lose
